net.jawr.web.resource.handler.reader

Interface StreamResourceReader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ResourceReader
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ServletContextResourceReader
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseServletContextResourceReader, CssSmartSpritesResourceReader, FileSystemResourceReader, PathPrefixedServletContextResourceReader, StreamResourceGeneratorReaderWrapper

    public interface StreamResourceReader
extends ResourceReader
    This interface is implemented by objects which can read Stream resources.
    Author:
    Ibrahim Chaehoi

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InputStream getResourceAsStream(String resourceName)
      Retrieves the input stream of a resource defined in the web application.
      InputStream getResourceAsStream(String resourceName, boolean processingBundle)
      Retrieves the input stream of a resource defined in the web application.

    • Method Detail

      • getResourceAsStream

        InputStream getResourceAsStream(String resourceName)
        Retrieves the input stream of a resource defined in the web application.
        Parameters:
        resourceName - the name of the resource.
        Returns:
        a input stream of the resource

      • getResourceAsStream

        InputStream getResourceAsStream(String resourceName,
                              boolean processingBundle)
        Retrieves the input stream of a resource defined in the web application.
        Parameters:
        resourceName - the name of the resource.
        processingBundle - the flag indicating that we are currently processing the bundles
        Returns:
        a input stream of the resource
